Name: Capoo Pals
About the game: A completely stress-free desktop pet that heals your boredom at work and school Let the cute and funny Capoo accompany you every moment of using the computer Use the mouse to have a fun interaction with Capoo! Collect bugcats books, many unknown Capoo and bugcats are waiting for you to discover and collect. Let's think~ Does it make you feel lonely when you are alone with your computer? Are you tired of the same presentations and information on the screen when you go to work? Feeling drained when you've been working on your term report all day? At this time, let Capoo and the bugcats accompany you to restore your vitality~ Now, the popular and cute Capoo & bugcats are officially knocking on your door! Capoo will bring all kinds of bugcats to accompany you through every moment in front of the computer screen Capoo and the bugcats , with the wallpaper of Capoo outdoor event, will make you full of energy every day! Interact with the Capoo on the desktop and let their funny expressions keep you in a good mood! Assisting Capoo to clean up the poop on the desktop can make them change from helpless to happy Now, let Capoo and the bugcats become good partners on your screen and desktop! [/h2]
